# Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Replacment of Electronic Systems at Kuujjuaq Airport

### Reference Number
WS4291033703-Doc4381415734

### Amendment Number
2

### Solicitation Number
WS4291033703

### Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals from qualified general contractors for the replacement of electronic systems at Kuujjuaq airport. The contractor will be responsible for the design, installation, and testing of the new electronic systems, as specified in the tender documents.

### Requirements

* Unspsc Code: 72151600 - Specialized communication system services
* Procurement Category: CNST
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End user Entity: Department of Transport (TC)

### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-12-13
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-16T14:00:00

### Amendments

* Last Amendment Number: 2
* Last Amendment Date: 2024-02-13

### Selection Criteria

* Selection will be based on the lowest price

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tendering Process

* Tendering Process: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive Open Bidding)
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

### Contact Information

* Name: Miriam Jeune (TPSGC / PSPC)
* Email: miriam.jeune@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18427561?extsite=MTg0Mjc1NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
